    • Method Detail

      • processRequest

        public BizResponse processRequest(BizRequest inRequest)
        This is the sole portal to the Business Tier through which all requests from the presentation tier are made, and through which all responses are delivered.

        The target business method(s) of each request is specified (as a Strings) in the BizRequest object itself. This code uses reflcetion to invoke the method(s)

        2003.09.03 HJK: This code is being called by Session Peas as well as Session Beans Caller must handle Session creation and deletion. We only handle the flush here.
